alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Daviess; Grundy; Harrison; Livingston; Mercer (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 11:13PM CDT until July 01 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Daviess County in north central Missouri... Grundy County in north central Missouri... Southwestern Mercer County in north central Missouri... Southern Harrison County in north central Missouri... Northeastern Caldwell County in north central Missouri... Livingston County in north central Missouri... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1113 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Gilman City to near Breckenridge to near Braymer, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Trenton, Bethany, Hamilton, Gallatin, Jamesport, Breckenridge, Gilman City, Pattonsburg, Wheeling, Utica, Spickard, Galt, Chula, Laredo, Coffey, Ludlow, Jameson, Mooresville and Mount Moriah. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 73 and 95. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Daviess; Grundy; Harrison; Livingston; Mercer
